roleset.name: forming an early idea, conception of

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: His preconception of the girl's softball team couldn't be further from the truth.

example.name: args 1, 2
example.text: I participate in lingual translation theories that challenge its preconception as a second-hand and inferior copy where the “origin” gets lost.
example.arg: as a second -hand and inferior copy

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-5, relation to conceive.01. Corresponds to VNcls characterize-29.2-1, deduce-97.2.
